entities.description: Questions about the respondent's cigarette smoking habits.
Indicates whether the respondent has ever smoked part or all of a cigarette.
The age at which the respondent first smoked part or all of a cigarette.
The year in which the respondent first smoked part or all of a cigarette.
Different response codes used in the survey for data such as 'NEVER USED CIGARETTES', 'REFUSED', 'DON'T KNOW', etc.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent has ever smoked part or all of a cigarette.
Indicates the age at which the respondent first smoked part or all of a cigarette.
Indicates the year in which the respondent first smoked part or all of a cigarette.
Associates a survey response with the corresponding response code (such as 'NEVER USED CIGARETTES', 'REFUSED', 'DON'T KNOW', etc.).
